name: use_tool
description: Execute a tool from an opened toolbox by delegating to the appropriate downstream MCP server. Tool name must be server-prefixed as shown in open_toolbox response.

toolbox_name.description: Name of the opened toolbox containing the tool

tool_name.description: Server-prefixed tool name from open_toolbox response (format: {server}__{tool})

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the downstream tool (schema defined in tool's inputSchema)

outputSchema.description: Returns the result from the downstream tool execution. Format depends on the specific tool invoked.

content.description: Tool output content (format varies by tool)

TOOLBOX_NOT_FOUND.description: Specified toolbox has not been opened via open_toolbox
TOOLBOX_NOT_FOUND.example: Toolbox 'prod' not found. Use open_toolbox first.

TOOL_NOT_FOUND.description: Specified tool does not exist in the opened toolbox

DELEGATION_ERROR.description: Error occurred during delegation to downstream server
DELEGATION_ERROR.example: Error calling downstream tool filesystem__read_file: Permission denied
